com.citytechinc.cq.component.annotations.widgets

Annotation Type PathField


  • @Retention(value=CLASS)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD})
public @interface PathField
    Represents a Widget of type CQ.form.PathField

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean escapeAmp
      True to url-encode the ampersand character (&) to %26.
      boolean hideTrigger
      True to disable the option to open the browse dialog
      boolean parBrowse
      True to allow paragraph browsing and section in a grid next to the tree panel in the browse dialog.
      String rootPath
      The root path where completion and browsing starts.
      String rootTitle
      Custom title for the root path
      boolean showTitleInTree
      Whether to show the (jcr:)titles as names of the tree nodes or the plain jcr node name

    • Element Detail

      • escapeAmp

        public abstract boolean escapeAmp
        True to url-encode the ampersand character (&) to %26.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • hideTrigger

        public abstract boolean hideTrigger
        True to disable the option to open the browse dialog
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • parBrowse

        public abstract boolean parBrowse
        True to allow paragraph browsing and section in a grid next to the tree panel in the browse dialog. If this is enabled, it is recommended to use a predicate like 'hierarchy' to have pages as leaf nodes in the tree.
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        false

      • rootPath

        public abstract String rootPath
        The root path where completion and browsing starts. Use the empty string for the repository root
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "/"

      • rootTitle

        public abstract String rootTitle
        Custom title for the root path
        Returns:
        String
        Default:
        "Websites"

      • showTitleInTree

        public abstract boolean showTitleInTree
        Whether to show the (jcr:)titles as names of the tree nodes or the plain jcr node name
        Returns:
        boolean
        Default:
        true
